home.title: ReRank AI
home.subtitle: From preventing ranking drops to boosting rankings, AI automatically identifies differences.
home.loginWithGoogle: Sign in with Google to get started
home.selectPropertyDescription: Please select the Search Console property of the site you want to analyze.
home.analyzeArticleDescription: Enter the article URL to retrieve ranking data, analyze differences with competitors, and get improvement suggestions.

chart.dropDetectedMessage: This page was not found in actual search results.
chart.lastPositionInGSC: In GSC, it was last at position {position}, but it may have dropped below 100th place now.
chart.noDataForKeyword: No data was retrieved for this keyword.
chart.lastRecordedPosition: The last recorded position was {position}, but it may have dropped below 100th place now.
chart.daysSinceLastData: {days} days have passed since the last data retrieval.
chart.gscDataNote: Google search results only record data for pages displayed within the top 100. If there is a period when data is not retrieved, the ranking may have dropped below 100th place in search results.

gsc.noAccessRights: This Google account does not have access rights to Search Console properties.
gsc.solution1: Add a site in Search Console
gsc.solution2: Request access rights to existing properties
gsc.solution3: Sign in with another Google account that has access rights to properties

article.articleUrlHint: Select from the article list above or enter the URL directly

analysis.saveFailed: ‚ö† Failed to save analysis results (display is still available)
analysis.saveError: ‚ö† Error occurred while saving analysis results (display is still available)

results.topRankingDescription: The following keywords are maintaining top positions. Let's keep this up.
results.detailedAnalysis: üîç Detailed Analysis Results - Click to Expand
results.recommendedAdditions: ‚ú® Recommended Additions (Details) ({count} items) - Click to Expand
results.referenceCompetitorSites: Reference: Competitor sites with this content

auth.title: Get Started by Linking with Google Search Console
auth.description: Retrieve your site's ranking data and automatically analyze and suggest improvements
auth.accountInfo: About the Google Account to Use
auth.accountInfoDescription: Please sign in with a Google account that has access rights to Search Console properties.
auth.accountInfoNote: Accounts without rights cannot retrieve site ranking data.
auth.step3: Enter article URL and start analysis
auth.noAccessRightsTitle: If you don't have access rights to Search Console properties
auth.noAccessRightsDescription: Add a site in Search Console or request access rights to existing properties.

errors.propertyNotSelected: Search Console property is not selected
errors.tokenExpired: Authentication token has expired. Please sign in again.

notification.dropReasonKeywords: Keywords such as "{keywords}" have dropped below 10th place

checker.fixedArticle: Article is marked as fixed and within cooldown period ({days} days), notification skipped
checker.recentNotification: Notification was sent within the past {days} days, skipping ({daysAgo} days ago)
checker.noConsecutiveDrop: Consecutive drop for {days} days not confirmed

email.subject: [ReRank AI] Rank drop detected
email.header: ReRank AI - Rank Drop Detection Report
email.referenceCompetitorSites: Reference: Competitor sites with this content
email.footer: ReRank AI - From preventing ranking drops to boosting rankings

settings.startMonitoringDescription: We will automatically check this article's rankings daily and send you an email notification if the rankings drop.
settings.notificationTimeDescription: We will check rankings daily at this time (default: 9:00 AM)
